description:
Little Sheep is on a butterfly catching adventure! Help our fluffy little hero explore the infinite gardens, outfox Foxster, and become the world's best butterfly catcher.

This story driven quest explores the themes of grit, hard work, and perseverance in achieving your goals.
name: Little Sheep
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
